item.description:
The cliff walk is a beautiful walk and there is plenty to do in town. Since it's approximately an hour and 40 min. drive from Boston I recommend car pooling. Also, we will start with lunch and then walk afterwards. We will start the walk after lunch around 1 or 1:30 from the parking lot at 117 memorial blvd., Newport, RI 02840



The Cliff Walk along the eastern shore of Newport, RI is world famous as a public access walk that combines the natural beauty of the Newport shore line with the architectural history of Newport's gilded age. Wildflowers, birds, geology ... all add to this delightful Walk.

In 1975 the Walk was designated as a National Recreation Trail ... the 65th in the nation and first in New England. The Walk runs 3.5 miles and about two-thirds of the walk is in easy walking condition. What makes Cliff Walk unique is that it is a National Recreation Trail in a National Historic District. For more info on the walk and parking:

http://www.cliffwalk....


Meet at 12:00 for lunch at:
Red Parrot
348 Thames Street
Newport, RI
401-847-3800

www.redparrotrestaurant.com

For more info on Newport:
http://www.gonewport....
item.name: Newport cliff walk
